Name: Jigsaw Pieces - Romance
About the game: Jigsaw puzzles and romance make a perfect couple! For a very long time, making jigsaw puzzles is a popular hobby for the whole family. Finding the right puzzle pieces and completing puzzles is both satisfying and relaxing. Would you like to own as much jigsaw puzzles as possible but do they take too much space and isnâ€™t there enough room to store them all? This gorgeous puzzle game solves your space problem in an instant because now you can make the most beautiful puzzles on your PC! The puzzles in this special Valentine Edition are all about love. Choose from a great amount of romantic puzzles in HD-quality and adjust the way you would like to play to your own preference. You get to decide for yourself how many pieces your puzzle may contain. Do you dare to make a puzzle with 1000 puzzles pieces or do you prefer a puzzle with a little less pieces? In this uplifting game your personal puzzle fun is central! features: 60 Romantic Jigsaw Puzzles increase the size of a puzzle up to 1000 pieces different cutout patterns+ Mosaic and Lacy cutouts 16 intriguing game modes customizable difficulty: from relaxing to challenging customizable Brightness and Coloring HD quality levels great rewards every day new Hint System interesting Random Puzzles of the day relaxing soundtrack take your most beloved levels as HD desktop wallpapers
